activities.name: Catania Baroque Festival
activities.description: Celebrate Catania's UNESCO World Heritage Sicilian Baroque architecture with special guided tours, exhibitions, and cultural events throughout the historic center.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held in May, this festival highlights the city's unique Baroque heritage with special access to normally closed palaces and cultural events.
activities.booking_tips: Special tours require advance booking; free events are first-come-first-served.

activities.name: Sant'Agata Spring Pilgrimage
activities.description: Join locals in spring celebrations honoring Catania's patron saint with processions and religious events in the historic center.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring offers perfect weather for religious celebrations and processions through the Baroque streets.
activities.booking_tips: No booking needed; arrive early to secure a good viewing spot for processions.

activities.name: Catania Food Festival
activities.description: Experience Catania's rich Sicilian culinary heritage with tastings, cooking demonstrations, and food market events featuring local specialties.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring brings fresh local ingredients and perfect weather for outdoor food events and tastings of Sicilian cuisine.
activities.booking_tips: Book cooking classes and special tastings in advance; market events are free.

activities.name: University of Catania Open Days
activities.description: Visit the historic University of Catania buildings and courtyards during special spring open days.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring brings special access to historic university buildings and guided tours of the campus.
activities.booking_tips: Check university website for open day schedules; some tours require advance registration.

activities.name: Giardino Bellini Spring Festival
activities.description: Enjoy spring activities in Catania's historic public park, including concerts, food stalls, and family events.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring brings perfect weather for outdoor activities in the park, with blooming flowers and pleasant Mediterranean temperatures.
activities.booking_tips: No booking needed for general events; check park website for special event schedules.

activities.name: Catania Art Week
activities.description: Experience contemporary art exhibitions and events throughout the city's galleries and cultural venues.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring brings special art exhibitions and cultural events to Catania's historic venues.
activities.booking_tips: Some exhibitions require advance booking; check event website for details.

activities.name: Easter Week Traditions
activities.description: Experience Catania's Holy Week celebrations and traditional Easter events in historic churches and the Cathedral of Sant'Agata.
activities.seasonal_notes: Holy Week brings special religious ceremonies and traditional celebrations to Catania's historic churches.
activities.booking_tips: Check church schedules for special events; arrive early for popular ceremonies.

activities.name: Mount Etna Spring Hiking
activities.description: Explore the slopes of Mount Etna during spring when wildflowers bloom and temperatures are ideal for hiking.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring offers perfect weather for hiking on Mount Etna with blooming flora and comfortable temperatures.
activities.booking_tips: Book guided tours in advance; wear appropriate hiking gear and check weather conditions.

activities.name: Catania Bike Tour
activities.description: Explore Catania's historic center and surrounding areas by bicycle during spring's pleasant Mediterranean weather.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring provides ideal conditions for cycling, with mild temperatures and blooming Mediterranean scenery.
activities.booking_tips: Book guided tours in advance; bike rentals available throughout the city.

activities.name: Catania Estate Festival
activities.description: Experience summer cultural events including outdoor concerts, theater performances, and film screenings in historic squares.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer brings a full program of outdoor cultural events to Catania's historic squares and venues.
activities.booking_tips: Check festival website for program; popular events may require advance booking.

activities.name: Mount Etna Sunset Tour
activities.description: Visit Mount Etna in the evening for spectacular sunset views over Catania and the Mediterranean Sea.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer evenings offer perfect conditions for the tour, with cooler temperatures and beautiful sunsets.
activities.booking_tips: Book tours in advance; bring warm clothing as temperatures drop at altitude.

activities.name: Catania Jazz Festival
activities.description: Enjoy jazz performances in historic venues and outdoor spaces throughout the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer brings international jazz artists to Catania's historic venues.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets in advance for popular performances; some outdoor events are free.

activities.name: La Pescheria Summer Nights
activities.description: Experience extended evening hours at the historic fish market with special summer events and street food.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer brings special evening events and extended hours to the historic fish market.
activities.booking_tips: No booking needed; arrive early for popular food stalls.

activities.name: Teatro Massimo Bellini Opera Festival
activities.description: Attend opera performances in the historic Teatro Massimo Bellini during the summer festival season.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer brings special opera productions to Catania's historic theater.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets months in advance; dress code is formal for evening performances.

activities.name: Giardino Bellini Summer Events
activities.description: Enjoy summer concerts, food festivals, and outdoor activities in the city's historic park.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer brings a full program of outdoor events to the park, including concerts and food festivals.
activities.booking_tips: Check park website for event schedule; bring picnic supplies for outdoor concerts.

activities.name: Catania Summer Sales
activities.description: Take advantage of Italy's regulated summer sales season in Catania's shopping districts.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer sales officially begin in early July, offering substantial discounts on Italian fashion.
activities.booking_tips: Shop early in the sales period for the best selection; no booking needed.

activities.name: Catania Food Tour Experience
activities.description: Explore Catania's Sicilian culinary heritage with guided food tours and tastings.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer offers perfect weather for food tours, with extended daylight hours.
activities.booking_tips: Book tours in advance; wear comfortable shoes for walking.

activities.name: Catania Night Photography Tour
activities.description: Capture Catania's historic Baroque architecture and Mediterranean atmosphere during summer evenings.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer provides ideal conditions for night photography with warm evenings and extended twilight.
activities.booking_tips: Book guided tours in advance; bring tripod and appropriate camera equipment.

activities.name: Catania Wine Festival
activities.description: Celebrate the wine harvest with tastings and events featuring local Sicilian wines from the Etna region.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn brings the wine harvest and perfect conditions for wine tasting events featuring Etna wines.
activities.booking_tips: Book tastings in advance; consider purchasing a wine pass for multiple tastings.

activities.name: Catania Film Festival
activities.description: Experience international and Italian cinema at this annual festival.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held in late September/early October, the festival brings premieres and special screenings.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets and festival passes online in advance; some screenings include director Q&A sessions.

activities.name: Vendemmia Experience on Mount Etna
activities.description: Participate in the grape harvest tradition in the vineyards of Mount Etna.
activities.seasonal_notes: September and early October are harvest months for local grape varieties on the volcanic slopes.
activities.booking_tips: Book vineyard tours with harvest experiences through wineries or tour operators.

activities.name: Catania Art Week
activities.description: Experience contemporary art exhibitions and events throughout the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn brings special art exhibitions and cultural events to historic venues.
activities.booking_tips: Check event website for program; some exhibitions require advance booking.

activities.name: Catania Food Week
activities.description: Celebrate Catania's Sicilian culinary heritage with special events, tastings, and cooking demonstrations.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn brings perfect weather for food events and showcases seasonal Sicilian ingredients.
activities.booking_tips: Book cooking classes and special tastings in advance; market events are free.

activities.name: Catania Baroque Walking Tour
activities.description: Explore Catania's historic Sicilian Baroque architecture with guided tours and special access.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn offers comfortable temperatures for walking tours and exploring the Baroque architecture.
activities.booking_tips: Book guided tours in advance; wear comfortable walking shoes.

activities.name: Catania Jazz Festival
activities.description: Enjoy jazz performances in historic venues throughout the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn brings international jazz artists to Catania's historic venues.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets in advance for popular performances; some events are free.

activities.name: Catania Food Market Tour
activities.description: Explore traditional Sicilian food markets and specialty shops in the historic center.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn brings seasonal ingredients and perfect weather for market visits.
activities.booking_tips: Book guided tours in advance; bring reusable shopping bags.

activities.name: Catania Architecture Tour
activities.description: Explore Catania's historic Sicilian Baroque architecture with guided tours and special access.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn offers comfortable temperatures for exploring the city's Baroque architecture.
activities.booking_tips: Book guided tours in advance; wear comfortable walking shoes.

activities.name: Catania Christmas Market
activities.description: Experience traditional Christmas markets and festive events in the historic center and Piazza del Duomo.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter brings festive markets and holiday celebrations to Catania's historic squares.
activities.booking_tips: Visit on weekday afternoons to avoid crowds; no booking needed.

activities.name: New Year's Eve in Piazza del Duomo
activities.description: Celebrate New Year's Eve with concerts and fireworks in the historic main square.
activities.seasonal_notes: December 31st brings one of Catania's largest public celebrations.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive early to secure a good spot; restaurants require advance booking.

activities.name: Teatro Massimo Bellini Opera Season
activities.description: Experience world-class opera at the historic Teatro Massimo Bellini.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter brings the main opera season with prestigious productions.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets months in advance; dress code is formal for evening performances.

activities.name: Catania Winter Sales
activities.description: Take advantage of Italy's regulated winter sales season in Catania's shopping districts.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter sales officially begin in early January, offering substantial discounts.
activities.booking_tips: Shop early in the sales period for the best selection; no booking needed.

activities.name: Catania Food Tour Experience
activities.description: Explore Catania's Sicilian culinary heritage with guided food tours and tastings.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter brings perfect conditions for indoor food tours and tastings of Sicilian cuisine.
activities.booking_tips: Book tours in advance; wear warm, comfortable clothing.

activities.name: Catania Carnival Celebrations
activities.description: Experience Catania's unique take on Carnival with parades and celebrations.
activities.seasonal_notes: Carnival brings street festivities and special events to the historic center.
activities.booking_tips: Check municipal website for parade routes and official events.

activities.name: Catania Baroque Walking Tour
activities.description: Explore Catania's historic Sicilian Baroque architecture with guided tours.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter offers unique perspectives on the Baroque architecture with seasonal decorations.
activities.booking_tips: Book guided tours in advance; wear warm, comfortable clothing.

activities.name: Catania Art Gallery Tour
activities.description: Visit Catania's historic art galleries and museums.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter brings special exhibitions and comfortable conditions for gallery visits.
activities.booking_tips: Check gallery websites for special exhibitions; some require advance booking.

activities.name: Catania Food Market Tour
activities.description: Explore traditional Sicilian food markets and specialty shops in the historic center.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter brings seasonal ingredients and perfect conditions for market visits.
activities.booking_tips: Book guided tours in advance; bring warm, comfortable clothing.
